channel.title: Lookin for someone who knows it all!
channel.description: Hey im looking for someone who can show me how to find commands and put them into a RSPS i would greatly appreciate it!!! i have teamviewer and i would love it if someone could teach me! thank you!!

item.title: Lookin for someone who knows it all!
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyb Mikeyb
item.description:
@Mikeyb wrote:

look you guys are telling me alot and this is great but i need a visual tutorial bc if i see it ill remember it… i would really appreciata someone connecting with me in teamviewer!!

Read full topic
item.source: Lookin for someone who knows it all!

item.title: Lookin for someone who knows it all!
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

                    [size=14pt][b]Adding stuff to shops[/b][/size]

Okay first off open your source file and go to config then scroll down to shops open that with notepad yout should see something like thisshop = 5 High_Level_Pk_Shop 2 2 3749 100 3751 100 3753 100 3755 100 1093 100 1127 100 1163 100 1201 100 1187 100 952 100 1540 100 4045 200 7457 100 7458 100 7459 100 7460 100 7461 100 1704 100 1725 100 1731 100 4131 100 1079 100 2440 100 2442 100 2436 100 2434 100 2444 100 3008 100 6685 100
Here is where we add the items
after the end of that add…

	itemID	amount

example…

100	1	4152	100

for those indents they are tabs i hope you get that idea
thats how u add stuff to shops…
I still dont know how to change the prices
REMEMBER TO SAVE AND COMPILE

                        [size=14pt][b]Adding Objects[/b][/size]

Okay first of all open your source file and open client.java search for MakeGlobal
when your done u should see this

makeGlobalObject(2864, 9936, 4755, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2320, 3674, 1276, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3089, 3489, 4151, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2690, 3368, 409, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2689, 3368, 410, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2694, 3368, 4714, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2694, 3369, 4714, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2694, 3370, 4714, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2694, 3371, 4714, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2694, 3372, 4714, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2694, 3373, 4714, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2691, 3374, 4714, 0, 10);
the first numbers are Xcoord 2nd is Ycoord 3rd is object id leave the other 2 numbers alone or your screwed
Make a copy of the makeGlobalObject(2694, 3371, 4714, 0, 10);
and put it under one of em
then change the coords and stuff and your ready to save and compile!

Read full topic

item.title: Lookin for someone who knows it all!
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

for commands go into client,java and search if (command
then it will show some commands like if (command.startsWith("checkinv") && playerRights >= 3) { String player = command.substring(9); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } }
after that add: if(command.startsWith("test") && playerRights >= 0 if you want to add a tele add under that

toX = 2740; toY = 5074;
To add items add under the base

            addItem(itemID, ammount);

Thats all i know so far

Read full topic
